tool_description: Forward & Reverse Geocoding API. Get address by location or location by address.
name: Forward & Reverse Geocoding
title: Forward & Reverse Geocoding

api_list.name: ForwardGeocoding
api_list.description: Turn an address into latitude and longitude (e.g. to display on a map) by schematic input.

optional_parameters.name: json_callback
optional_parameters.description: Use this with format=json to define a callback function for jsonp.

optional_parameters.name: bounded
optional_parameters.description: Used in conjunction with viewbox to search only in an area.

optional_parameters.name: namedetails
optional_parameters.description:
- namedetails = [0,1]

Set this to 1 to receive different spellings in different languages of a returned place.
Default is 0.

optional_parameters.name: countrycodes
optional_parameters.description: Two letter country code to restrict area to search in. Use the country code as defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha2.

optional_parameters.name: accept-language
optional_parameters.description: Set the query and response language. Accepts two letter language codes (e.g. 'en' or 'es') or a combination of language and region code, e.g. 'en-GB' or 'es-AR'. Default: 'en'.

optional_parameters.name: viewbox
optional_parameters.description: Format: x1,y1,x2,y2 - restrict search area to a bounded box defined by two coordinates (x is longitude, y is latitude). The two coordinates have to span a box to work.

api_list.name: ReverseGeocoding
api_list.description: Find address or place by latitude and longitude

optional_parameters.name: accept-language
optional_parameters.description: Set the response language. Accepts two letter language codes (e.g. 'en' or 'es') or a combination of language and region code, e.g. 'en-GB' or 'es-AR'. Default: 'en'.

api_list.name: GeocodingSearch

optional_parameters.name: countrycodes
optional_parameters.description: Two-letter country code as defined in ISO 3166-1 alpha2 to restrict search to a country.

optional_parameters.name: json_callback
optional_parameters.description: Name of json callback function for jsonp calls. Use format=json for this.

optional_parameters.name: viewbox
optional_parameters.description: Format: x1,y1,x2,y2 where is x is longitude and y latitude. The two coordinates have to span a box to let this work in conjunction with bounded=1 (see there).

optional_parameters.name: bounded
optional_parameters.description: Use bounded=1 in conjunction with viewbox to restrict search area. You can use this to search for amenities in a given area, e.g. post offices or police stations, etc. as q param.

optional_parameters.name: accept-language
optional_parameters.description: Set the query and response language. Accepts two letter language codes (e.g. 'en' or 'es') or a combination of language and region code, e.g. 'en-GB' or 'es-AR'. Default: 'en'.
